sentences.sContent: He was full of his own importance (= he behaved in an annoying way which showed that he thought he was very important ).
...as its importance begins to be more appreciated...
... Almost all companies recognize the importance of innovation today...
...The latest congressional report acknowledges the critical importance of technical training...
...She also let me know the importance of confidence...
...I have learned the importance of courage...
...we should think highly of the importance of basic and fundamental skills that guarantee our wonderful and brilliant future...
...It reveals the importance of doing small things well before undertaking something big...
...we ought to fully realize the importance of reading literature...
...The importance of reading literatureAs is humorously portrayed in the cartoon...
...the symbolical meaning of this picture is to show us the importance of reading literature...

phrases.pCn: 有着重要意义，十分重要
重要的；具有重要意义的
重视；着重于…；对…给予重视

words.tran: 重要的，重大的；有地位的；有权力的
重要地；大量地；有名望地；自命不凡地
进口，进口货；输入；意思，含义；重要性
